message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. Accept and we can finish the game early!
Meet me in the middle, let's end this quickly!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. Think carefully!
I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of you!
I'm not going to give up too much more. You'll have to make a better offer if you want me to accept!
I'm starting to get impatient, Alice! Time to make a serious offer!
I'm not going to give up control of the game yet. Make a better offer, or I'll make you regret it!
I'm not going to back down, Alice. It's time to meet my price!
I'm not going to give up yet! You'll have to make a serious offer if you want me to accept.
It's getting late, Alice. I'm not budging. Take it or leave it!
